product_name: Marin Kentfield CS2 Step-Through Women's Bike - 2014
long_description: Great for casual, everyday riding, the Marin Kentfield CS2 step-through women's bike offers a comfortable, upright ride, a bump-absorbent seat and a design that makes mounts and dismounts a breeze. Bike's overall geometry and flat handlebar provide a comfortable upright ride, minimizing body strains and optimizing visibility. Step-through frame makes it easy to get on and off your bike. Marin Women's Sport Plush saddle provides ergonomic support and cushioning, and a shock-absorbent seat post takes the jarring bumps out of uneven roads. 6061 aluminum frame features hydroformed top and down tubes to increase strength without adding weight. Triple crankset and 7-speed cassette combine to provide 21 gears for fun, swift cruising and efficient hill climbing. Intuitive Shimano EF51 EZ-FIRE Plus shifters and Shimano derailleurs provide responsive, smooth shifting. Linear-pull brakes slow you down in a controlled manner for easy speed maintenance. Schwalbe Road Cruise tires offer puncture protection to deter mood-deflating flats. Marin Kentfield CS2 step-through women's bike specs are subject to change.
